titles.title: Directing the Attorney General of the United States to transmit to the House of Representatives, not later than 14 days after the date of the adoption of this resolution, any documents and legal memoranda in the Attorney General's possession relating to the practice of targeted killing of United States citizens and targets abroad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Adversely by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported adversely by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 112-704.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 168.

bill.summary: 12/18/2012--Reported to House without amendment. Directs the Attorney General to transmit to the House of Representatives any documents and legal memoranda in the Attorney General's possession relating to the practice of targeted killing of United States citizens and targets abroad.
